divs: Sighting DetailsI had just finished watching the baltimore orioles defeat the red soxs @ about 10:30 pm .Iwent out to my back deck .I was looking in the direction what i believe to be N . W WHEN I SEEN A RED OBJECT IN THE DISTANCE heading @ me it pass over head . it did not make any noise and was quite larger as i look up it pass over and continued in what i believe is a s e direction. I continued to watch this object for what seem like 3 or 4 more minutes as it traveled away from me and became a very small little red star like object out on the horizen. I turn around in look up and all most immeadley another of the same size shape and color was passing over head .I WATCH this 2nd object the same as i did the 1st one for about the same amount of time. It when what look like the same exact direction
